personal.name: Anders Folkesson
personal.label: Tech savvy problem solver
personal.summary: Problem solver, programmer, tinkering 'jack of many trades' and kind human being. Not neccessarily in that order.

talents.name: Problem Solving
talents.description: With many years of practice and experience I am never looking for an easy way out. I am always trying to find the real problem to solve. It is my conviction that a proper solution is the best solution in the long run.

talents.name: Quick Learner
talents.description: With a broad and varied knowledge base, long experience and interest in technology, It is easy for me to understand new tasks in different domains.

talents.name: Cooperative
talents.description: I strongly beleive in cooperation and knowledge sharing. Helping my collegues whenever I can and not afraid of asking for help when needed. Kindness and caring is important on every workplace (everywhere really).

work.name: University of Gothenburg
work.summary: Working as a research engineer at the Sahlgrenska Academy, University of Gothenburg. Our core facility 'Centre for cellular imaging' provides state of the art microscopes and assistance to researchers. My main tasks are to maintain and develop software for automating image acquisition, processing and analysis. The work involves close cooperation with researchers and colleagues.

work.name: Mentice AB
work.summary: Member of the platform team with responsibility to maintain and develop the main software platform as well as the rest of the software stack. I also work closely with the hardware/firmware developers. Our main product is the VIST medical simulator for various endovascular surgery procedures.

work.name: Mentice AB
work.summary: Implementing customer requests in our medical simulator. My tasks included scripting of new features, configuring hardware and implementing new software in and around the main simulator.

work.name: Cybercom Group
work.summary: Consultant at the Embedded group. Working with software development in both telecom and automotive as well as other areas, often using and agile methodology. Working as a scrum master in some projects I found the scrum way of working very enjoyable and smart.

work.name: Styra Robotics AB
work.summary: Developing a system for simulation of four, five and six axis industrial robots.

work.name: Enmesh AB
work.summary: Development of a CAD/FEM software. Workd on ui/3D as well as other areas of the program.

work.name: Edoctrina AB
work.summary: Development of an e-learning program in Java where existing school book assignments (math and physics mostly) were made interactive.

education.name: Masters Program: Complex Adaptive Systems
education.summary: Masters program with focus on evolving and emergent systems. Using and studying AI, ANN, genetic algorithms and machine learning.

education.name: Computer Science
education.summary: Studied Computer Science at GU. Courses included Algorithms, operating systems, Software development, 3D and more.

education.name: Programming Mobile Applications for Android Handheld Systems
Programming Mobile Services for Android Handheld Systems: Concurrency
education.summary: Online course in android programming. Focusing on concurrency and continuing on the previous course.

education.name: To satisfy my curiosity and to fan the flame of my desire to learn
education.summary: Carpenter joinery (diploma course), black smithing, piano and guitar, clown and improvisation, singing, drawing, sports education
